Title: Juno
Overview: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes an unusual decision regarding her unborn child.
Tagline: A comedy about growing up… and the bumps along the way.
Keywords: sexuality, becoming an adult, puberty, first time, oscar award, pregnancy and birth, pregnant minor, precocity, partnership, teenager, teenage pregnancy
Cast: Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner
